column1: not as strong as his kite.
a sign of his feathered friend.
not as good as the one at the space station.
not sharp enough to cut the tomato.
not as clean as his real pet.
clean and ready to be polished.
making the cold treat extra yummy.
the same as the one in the school clock.
a safe place for the ducks to rest.
not as light as the old one.
still strong and not as strong as before.
